item.title: How can i make more money on my server it only can have 999m :(
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go to player.java and search for.

public int maxItemAmount

then you should see on that same line “999999999”
change it to “2147483647” that is the MAX money you can have.
